relevant_findings.general: In no acute distress, sitting up in ED stretcher.
relevant_findings.HEENT: Mucus membranes moist, nares clear, trachea at midline.
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate, rhythm. No appreciable murmurs, rubs, gallops.
relevant_findings.abdominal: Well-healed paramedian and low midline incision consistent with prior appendectomy. Focally tender in left lower quadrant and suprapubic region.
relevant_findings.neurological: Alert, oriented to person, place, time.
